snippet: A provincial Russian court on Monday overturned the verdict for a cleaning lady who was convicted of disseminating child pornography in a social media post decrying abuse....

headline.main: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses
headline.print_headline: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses

lead_paragraph: A provincial Russian court on Monday overturned the verdict for a cleaning lady who was convicted of disseminating child pornography in a social media post decrying abuse.
